thread.section_title: Lyft Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Lyft | www.lyft.com | 3 of 104
thread.title: Jeff Gamble

author: Jeff Gamble
title: Jeff Gamble
text: As a passenger first, then as a driver, Lyft provides a better experience than the other ride share services. There is a human element to Lyft, As a driver, I know I can speak with someone if I have an issue, there's actual in person driver orientation, and Lyft goes the extra mile in performing background checks and ensuring passenger safety. As a rider, I have never had a bad experience with Lyft.
